attributes.action: Scrap 'e-Petitions' with immediate effect, as they are nothing but another form of wasted tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all know the results of these e-Petitions are treated with contempt. They are nothing more than a gimmick. In these troubled economic times, let's save some of the public's hard-earned taxes being wasted on yet more of this nonsense. Scrap them now.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
